verses.text: Thou \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, art \w just|strong="H4941"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w what|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* doth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w prosper|strong="H7951"\w*: \w why|strong="H4069"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* well \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* transgress, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* wickedly?

Thou hast \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w taken|strong="H8327"\w* \w root|strong="H8327"\w*: \w they|strong="H1571"\w* prosper \w and|strong="H6310"\w* bring forth \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*: thou art \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w their|strong="H1571"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H1571"\w* \w their|strong="H1571"\w* reins.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, hast \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w proved|strong="H6942"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee: gather \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w together|strong="H0854"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* sacrifice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w herb|strong="H6212"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein? \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* consumed: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w last|strong="H0319"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w wearied|strong="H3811"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w running|strong="H7323"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w footmen|strong="H7273"\w*, \w how|strong="H0349"\w* canst thou contend \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*? \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w been|strong="H0776"\w* \w secure|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w what|strong="H0349"\w* wilt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* swelling \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* fought \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* voice: \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* dear \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wood: \w is|strong="H3651"\w* hath \w cried|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H5159"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w speckled|strong="H6641"\w* \w bird|strong="H5861"\w*? \w Is|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H5159"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w bird|strong="H5861"\w* died \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w*? \w come|strong="H0857"\w* ye, \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, make haste \w to|strong="H5921"\w* devour.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* pastors \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, they \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w trodden|strong="H0947"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w portion|strong="H2513"\w* under foot: they \w have|strong="H5414"\w* changed \w my|strong="H5414"\w* delightful \w portion|strong="H2513"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w waste|strong="H8074"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* hath \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w With|strong="H5921"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*; \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* considereth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* spoilers \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ways \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* thereof: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sown|strong="H2232"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* reaped \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* received \w an|strong="H3068"\w* inheritance, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w*: \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fruits, because \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w neighbors|strong="H7934"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* shared \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pluck|strong="H5428"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pluck|strong="H5428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w plucked|strong="H5428"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H0376"\w*, \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w baal|strong="H1168"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w utterly|strong="H0006"\w* \w pluck|strong="H5428"\w* \w out|strong="H0006"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
